name: Velouté de Poisson
recipeInstructions: 1. Melt the butter, stir in the flour and cook it for 1 minute, stirring frequently.
2. Meanwhile heat the fumet to boiling point.
3. Pur the fumet over the roux gradually, off the heat, using a whisk to make the sauce as smooth as possible.
4. Add the mushroom stalks and bring back to boiling point.
5. Lower the heat or use a bain marie, and reduce by half (about 45 minutes), whisking in any skin that forms on top.
6. Add cream until the taste and consistency is right.
